title: SRP ISO Certificate
fileContent: Place and date              For the issuing office   Katy, TX, 06 July 2020   DNV GL     Business Assurance   1400 Ravello Drive, Katy, TX, 77449  5164,  USA             Sherif Mekkawy   Management Representative         Lack of fulfilment of conditions as set out in the Certification Agreement may render this Certificate invalid   ACCREDITED UNIT DNV GL Business Assurance USA, Inc, 1400 Ravello Drive, Katy, TX, 77449, USA TEL1 281  396  1000 wwwdnvglcertcom         Certificate No   CERT  02147  2005  AQ  HOU  ANAB   Initial certification date   17 December 1998     Valid   06 July 2020     10 May 2023     This is to certify that the management system of     Standard Rubber   P rod ucts Co         120 Seegers Avenue, Elk Grove Village, IL, 60007  1615, USA       has been found to conform to the Quality Management System standard   ISO 90012015       This certificate is valid for the following scope   Fabrication and Conversion of Custom Non  Metallic Components and  Materials, Specializing in Die Cutting, Reciprocating Knife Cutting, Water  Jet  Cutting, Laser Cutting and Specialty Lamination
